about_the_game:
Step into a world where art, history, and exploration come alive through an immersive, multiplayer experience. "Museums of History" lets you and fellow explorers from across the globe visit meticulously recreated museums, interact with historical artifacts, and share insights in real-time—all from the comfort of your own home.

Key Features:

Immersive Museum Environments Explore vast museum environments, each featuring beautifully detailed galleries. View famous paintings, rare artifacts, and cutting-edge interactive exhibits. Travel through time as you explore ancient civilizations, modern masterpieces, and hidden treasures.

Multiplayer Adventure Connect with friends and players from around the world. Work together to uncover secrets, discuss your favorite exhibits, and collaborate in solving museum-wide puzzles. With multiplayer support, every visit is a shared adventure.

Voice Chat Integration Enhance your experience with real-time voice chat. Engage in discussions with other players as you explore exhibits, exchange thoughts on the art, or dive into a shared passion for history. Voice chat brings a personal touch to your multiplayer museum visits.

Interactive Exhibits Engage with interactive exhibits like never before. Solve ancient riddles, discover hidden passages, and unlock the mysteries behind iconic works of art. Your interactions can shape the course of your visit, making every experience unique.

Player Profiles as Passports Track your journey with custom player profiles designed as passports. As you visit different museums within the game, your passport will earn stamps to show which exhibitions you’ve explored. Share your collection of stamps with friends and see where they've ventured in the virtual museum world.

Article and Content Comment System After exploring an exhibit or artifact, leave a comment for others to see. Share your thoughts, interpretations, or even fun facts you've discovered. Read and interact with other players' comments on the museum’s art and exhibits, fostering a sense of community and collaboration.

Avatar Selection and Customization Personalize your museum experience by choosing a custom avatar. Select from a wide array of styles and outfits to represent your identity. Your avatar will be synced across all multiplayer sessions, allowing others to recognize and engage with you easily.

Achievements and Badges Earn achievements and collectible badges by completing specific challenges within the game. Whether you solve a particularly tough puzzle, complete an entire museum, or uncover hidden artifacts, there’s always a new badge to earn.

content_descriptors.notes: Museums of History is an educational game that explores significant historical events. The game includes depictions of historical violence, such as wars and revolutions, and mature themes, including suffering and oppression, presented for educational purposes. Some visuals may include distressing imagery, such as representations of historical tragedies, but these are intended to provide an accurate understanding of history. Viewer discretion is advised.
